title: Optex AX70TN Weatherproof Infrared Beam Motion Detector, 70'
features: Mount transmitter and receiver up to 165 ft. apart
When beam is broken NC contacts open
Dual pulsed IR beams reduce false alarms
Resistant to rain, fog, snow and frost
Automatically adjusts trigger sensitivity level for slowly changing weather conditions
description: With this outdoor infrared beam detector you can provide extra security to your home by creating a fence you can not see up to 70 ft. long outdoors (165 ft. indoors).
